scripts.build: rm -rf docs && rm -rf dist && rollup -c && yarn docs
scripts.git-push: git add . && echo "${0}" | git commit -F - && yarn publish --patch --no-git-tag-version && version="v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"  && git add . && echo $version | git commit -F - ; git push origin main && echo $version | git tag -a $(echo $version) -F - && git push origin --tags
